attributes.action: Force BT to Do something about Broadband Speeds
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We are supposed to be a global leader yet other Countries or Territory's specifically Hong Kong, France, Slovenia (To Name a few) have gone to great lengths to provide their citizens with fast internet connections and BT are not planning to do the same for some years to come.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
